body:
i bought gold then now the new things wont work 
e.g it says  walls upgrades like some kits the wont work

title: PLZ READ GOLD CHANGED

replies.body: Well you still have gold so don't worry. Some of the changes are due to Avicore read down this list to see what abilities you have. http://avicus.net/shop
replies.body_tagged: Well you still have gold so don't worry. Some of the changes are due to Avicore read down this list to see what abilities you have. http://avicus.net/shop

replies.body: What are you trying to do? For Walls you don't get ALL premium kits. You only get about 3. Same for all the other games/ Also you can't fly in the lobby anymore.
replies.body_tagged: What are you trying to do? For Walls you don't get ALL premium kits. You only get about 3. Same for all the other games/ Also you can't fly in the lobby anymore.

replies.body: if u get a premium kit does that mean u can use it because it says to me must be level blabla
replies.body_tagged: if u get a premium kit does that mean u can use it because it says to me must be level blabla

replies.body: You still need to be that level to play it. Non-premiums can play as the kit at all.
replies.body_tagged: You still need to be that level to play it. Non-premiums can play as the kit at all.

replies.body:
Its Just Saying That When You Have That Rank You Can Unlock It Once You Reach The Level Or Whatever Is Needed, Compared To People Who Don't Have The Rank, If They Get Up To A Certain Level For That Specific Kit Then They Can't Unlock It
 
Hope That Makes Sense And Helped A Bit
replies.body_tagged:
Its Just Saying That When You Have That Rank You Can Unlock It Once You Reach The Level Or Whatever Is Needed, Compared To People Who Don't Have The Rank, If They Get Up To A Certain Level For That Specific Kit Then They Can't Unlock It
 
Hope That Makes Sense And Helped A Bit

replies.body: When you buy gold, you unlock the ability to use the kits once you reach the level required.
replies.body_tagged: When you buy gold, you unlock the ability to use the kits once you reach the level required.
